about_text1: The AquaDoctor.uz brand was created in 2017. More than 1000 buyers have confirmed the quality of our products. Thanks to the wide range of products, AquaDoctor.uz chemicals are successfully used for water care at various facilities:
experience: The company has more than 13 years of experience in the field of construction and maintenance of swimming pools

customer_text_1: Pimtaş Plastik was founded in 1977 and is a leading enterprise in the plastic sector, designing and designing individual plastic building materials (pipes, fittings, ball valves, throttle valves, check valves, couplings, pool equipment, and technical network equipment).
customer_text_2: Today, Pimtaş Plastik has an ISO 9001 quality management system and infrastructure, equipment, and mold systems. The company exports products to 105 countries, especially European countries, and has earned the satisfaction and trust of consumers in 81 provinces.
